title: 其實香港人高估左美國啲大學生

replies.msg:
做過HR就知

大部份外國名牌大學生能力幾差吓 因為攞到獎學金多數留番美國 自資嗰班冇能力先番香港

睇番admission rate 原來UC system 係20-40% 更加唔好講其他「名牌」大學 仲有捐錢入大學 同埋用社區大學做後門狗入美國啲大學
行內會揀番ivy League


而香港JUPAS保底 admission rate 20% 其實學生質素唔差 不過論研究實力 由於美國大學極有錢 所以有充足資源做研究 排名先高
唔洗做過HR都知大學生都係廢嘅
做HR話人廢係咩玩法

quote.msg: 做HR話人廢係咩玩法

replies.msg: 有咩問題 唔係番工時間
名氣大唔係不嬲都係因為postgrad好咩
大把dse1x分讀返cc入ucla ucb

UC Berkeley SAT LQ 1350/1600
等於 DSE Eng lv5 Math lv4/5 咋
香港地都多asso升U嘅

replies.msg: Surely the HKDSE English Paper 1 Part B2 does test English literacy to some extent. In some years the paper might had been too easy but that doesn't justify a negative light on HKDSE per se.

等於 DSE Eng lv5 Math lv4/5 咋

replies.msg: And you forgot about the Math part. SAT Math level 2 would map well onto HKDSE Core Math Paper 2. The compulsory part of SAT Math is a joke.

quote.msg:
UC Berkeley SAT LQ 1350/1600
等於 DSE Eng lv5 Math lv4/5 咋

收皮啦兩個exam根本冇關係
DSE係考Use of English, SAT考嘅係English Literacy
SAT對英文嘅要求其實仲高

利申DSE 英文5* 數學5** SAT 1460
Surely the HKDSE English Paper 1 Part B2 does test English literacy to some extent. In some years the paper might had been too easy but that doesn't justify a negative light on HKDSE per se.

replies.msg:
I’m not trying to say HKDSE sucks, but the knowledge it looks for is not equivalent, or even similar to the SAT such that no comparisons should be made between them, and their scores cannot be inter-converted solely based on the result of another.

In my opinion, SAT should be more difficult for local HKDSE students as the curriculum here mainly treats English as a tool instead of an art. Students need to study things beyond the DSE in order to get good results in the SAT.

quote.msg:
UC Berkeley SAT LQ 1350/1600
等於 DSE Eng lv5 Math lv4/5 咋

收皮啦兩個exam根本冇關係
DSE係考Use of English, SAT考嘅係English Literacy
SAT對英文嘅要求其實仲高

利申DSE 英文5* 數學5** SAT 1460
And you forgot about the Math part. SAT Math level 2 would map well onto HKDSE Core Math Paper 2. The compulsory part of SAT Math is a joke.

replies.msg:
I agree that SAT math part is way easier than the HKDSE Math Compulsory Part in terms of content, but this doesn’t necessarily mean that students can perform better in the SAT. Exam-takers may still make many careless mistakes under restricted time.

Also, a 1350-1500/1600 SAT score doesn’t assure you a 100% chance to get into UC Berkeley or other renowned colleges in the US. Admission offices there review applicants holistically where extracurriculars and essays are equally important.

usa個隻係有問題的。
特別係數學系，太容易了。一去大學讀深啲數點銜接?
另外，文科d問題亦係較淺。

其實哩種generalist approach係有問題。

replies.msg: True. So, first, you shouldn’t have said UC Berkeley’s 1350 is comparable to DSE 4/5, even if so, students there are generally more versatile since the applicants’ all-roundedness is the most prominent consideration when it comes to US colleges, and comparing them with HK students just using exam scores is inappropriate.

其實可能同美國文化有關 美國運動產業都發達 大學睇埋extracurriculars俾student athletes容易啲入 培養到好嘅運動員校名都威啲

replies.msg:
The general subjects are taken care of in the SAT and school curriculum. Top US students learn an European language and also have a broad humanities education which can be compared to Chinese and LS in DSE respectively.
But isn't the large number of subjects required a bad thing about DSE itself? I mean you often complain that DSE students focus too much on core subjects.
